content: <CoRIS>  <Date-Time-Last-Modified>19790625140221 </Date-Time-Last-Modified>  <Personal-Name>Starck, Walter A. </Personal-Name>  <Title>The blue reef : a report from beneath the sea : the adventures and observations of Walter Starck, marine biologist and authority on sharks, at Enewetak Atoll, a coral reef in the Pacific Ocean / told by Alan Anderson, Jr. </Title>  <Edition-Statement>1st ed. </Edition-Statement>  <Imprint>New York : Knopf : distributed by Random House, 1979. </Imprint>  <Physical-Description>x, 259 p., [4] leaves of plates : ill. ; 24 cm. </Physical-Description>  <General-Note>Includes index. </General-Note>  <Subject-Added-Topical-Term>Coral reef ecology Marshall Islands Enewetak Atoll. </Subject-Added-Topical-Term>  <Subject-Added-Topical-Term>Nuclear explosions Environmental aspects Marshall Islands Enewetak Atoll. </Subject-Added-Topical-Term>  <Subject-Added-Topical-Term>Silky shark </Subject-Added-Topical-Term>  <Subject-Added-Topical-Term>Marine biology Marshall Islands Enewetak Atoll. </Subject-Added-Topical-Term>  <Subject-Added-Geographic-Name>Enewetak Atoll (Marshall Islands) </Subject-Added-Geographic-Name>  <Added-Entry-Personal-Name>Anderson, Alan, 1943- </Added-Entry-Personal-Name>  <Access-Information>NOAA Central Library, Silver Spring, MD|STACKS|QH198.E53 S73 1979|BOOK|1 </Access-Information>  <Region>RMI </Region>  <Bounding>  <Eastbc>169.97 </Eastbc>  <Westbc>162.302 </Westbc>  <Southbc>5.573 </Southbc>  <Northbc>14.71 </Northbc>  </Bounding>  <Local-number>noaalib-ocm04136099 </Local-number>  <Local-subject-index>publication </Local-subject-index>  <Local-subject-index>outreach </Local-subject-index>  <resdesc>CoRIS Bibliographic </resdesc> </CoRIS>
